document.full_text: plutonium found in soil at the fukushima nuclear complex heightened alarm on tuesday over japan's battle to contain the world's worst atomic crisis in 25 years, as pressure mounted on the prime minister to widen an evacuation zone around the plant.
document.title: japan finds plutonium in soil at stricken nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: plutonium found in soil at the fukushima nuclear complex heightened alarm on tuesday over japan's battle to contain the world's worst atomic crisis in 25 years, as pressure mounted on the prime minister to widen an evacuation zone around the plant.
